definitions.definition: A cereal , Sorghum genus and species, the grains of which are cultivated to make flour and feed cattle . Almost all cultivated ones as well as some wild ones belong to the species Sorghum bicolor (syn. Sorghum vulgare ).

main_definition: A cereal , Sorghum genus and species, the grains of which are cultivated to make flour and feed cattle . Almost all cultivated ones as well as some wild ones belong to the species Sorghum bicolor (syn. Sorghum vulgare ).
